item.title: Medical Experts Raise Grave Doubts Over Conviction of ‘Killer Nurse’ Lucy Letby
item.description: After assessing the cases of 17 babies at the heart of the British nurse’s murder trials, a panel of specialists said that they had found no evidence ...

item.title: As Australia’s Election Nears, Peter Dutton Has a ‘Trump Lite’ Approach
item.description: Peter Dutton, who wants to be prime minister, has been taking aim at “wokeness.” But Australia’s electorate isn’t America’s, and there are lines he wo...

item.title: Buffalo Bills Fans Have It Tough, Especially in Antarctica
item.description: Research scientists in remote locations need to get creative in order to follow their favorite teams, even when they don’t like the outcomes.

item.title: ‘Like a Horror Movie’: Gazans Return Home After Cease-Fire
item.description: Two young Gazans, Aya Ehab Zaid and Abed Alaziz Hunaif, embarked on a long journey to return to their homes after nearly 16 months of war in Gaza.

item.title: Chris Wright Is Confirmed as Secretary of Energy
item.description: The former fracking executive said in confirmation hearings that his top priority would be to “unleash” American energy production.
